TaskDescription.Detail: Writes, reads, and saves text to the clipboard as a file.

Assist.value: Save the 'sample text' text to the clipboard.
text to save to clipboard Enter 'sample text'.
Get the 'sample text' text stored in the clipboard and save it to this.clipboard.
Get the text 'sample text' stored in the clipboard and input the variable 'this.clipboard' to save it.
Outputs the value of this.clipboard to the message box.
Enter the variable 'this.clipboard' that stores the value to be displayed in the message box.
Saves the value ('sample text') stored in the clipboard as 'C:\\sampletext.txt' file.
Enter the path and file 'C:\\sampletext.txt' to save the clipboard contents.
Execute the 'C:\\sampletext.txt' file and save the pid of the launched app.
Enter the variable 'this.pid' to store the pid of the launched app.
Specify 3 seconds as the time to check the contents of the executed file.
The executed 'C:\\sampletext.txt' file is terminated using pid.
Enter the variable 'this.pid' where the pid of the app to be shut down is stored.
Delete the 'C:\\sampletext.txt' file that has been verified.
Enter the path to be deleted and the file 'C:\\sampletext.txt'.
